main.java

Class Farm

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Farm

  • public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about the player's farm as well as references to all Crops, Animals, and Items stored in the farm.
    Version:
    1.0, May 2020.
    Author:
    Daniel Felgate, He Zheng Jing Rui

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Farm.FarmType
      The possible farm types to select.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals
      A list of animals living on the farm.
      java.util.ArrayList<Crop> crops
      A list of crops growing on the farm.
      Farm.FarmType farmType
      The farm's type.
      Inventory items
      An inventory of items held on the farm.
      int money
      The farm's current money.
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the farm.
      int tidiness
      The current tidiness level of the farm.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Farm(java.lang.String name, int money, Farm.FarmType farmType)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int animalAmount(Animal.AnimalType type)
      Returns the number of animals of the given type in the farm's animals list.
      int cropAmount(Crop.CropType type)
      Returns the number of crops of the given type in the farm's crops list.
      boolean hasAnimal(Animal.AnimalType type)
      Shorthand for animalAmount > 0.
      boolean hasAnyAnimals()
      Returns whether the farm has any animals of any type currently on the farm.
      boolean hasAnyCrops()
      Returns whether the farm has any crops of any type currently growing.
      boolean hasCrop(Crop.CropType type)
      Shorthand for cropAmount > 0.
      void plantCrop(Crop.CropType type)
      Adds a new crop to the farm's crops, and removes one of the required seed from the farm's inventory.
      float rainChance()
      Returns a float value based on the farm's type to be used in a random object to determine whether the farm receives any rain.
      void reduceTidyness()
      Reduces the tidiness of the farm by one and destroys crops if the farm becomes too messy.
      void resetTidiness()
      Reset the farm's tidiness level to max.
      java.lang.String tidinessDescription()
      Returns a description that details the current tidiness of the farm.

        Shorthand for cropAmount > 0.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • hasAnyCrops

        public boolean hasAnyCrops()

        Returns:
        Whether there are any animals currently living on the farm.

      • rainChance

        public float rainChance()
        Returns a float value based on the farm's type to be used in a random object to determine whether the farm receives any rain.
        Returns:
        Float chance from 0 - 1 of rain happening each night.
